title: Class storage failure for aliased classes
body:
Looks like that if a class is aliased by another one (the alias definition only contains the `class_alias` instruction to the aliased class), psalm crashes with the class storage error.

Example : stripe's `Stripe\FileUpload` class which is an alias to `Stripe\File` : https://github.com/stripe/stripe-php/blob/master/lib/FileUpload.php

Failing example :

```php
<?php
use Stripe\FileUpload;

// ...

$uploadedFile = FileUpload::create(
    [
        'purpose' => $purpose,
        'file'    => \fopen($file->getRealPath(), 'r'),
    ],
    [
        "stripe_account" => $accountId,
    ]
);
```

Expected psalm to report an error (if there are, didn't really check), had a crash with

```
PHP Fatal error:  Uncaught InvalidArgumentException: Could not get class storage for stripe\fileupload in /home/talus/.config/composer/vendor/vimeo/psalm/src/Psalm/Internal/Provider/ClassLikeStorageProvider.php:47
Stack trace:
#0 /home/talus/.config/composer/vendor/vimeo/psalm/src/Psalm/Internal/Analyzer/ClassLikeAnalyzer.php(314): Psalm\Internal\Provider\ClassLikeStorageProvider->get('stripe\\fileuplo...')
#1 /home/talus/.config/composer/vendor/vimeo/psalm/src/Psalm/Internal/Analyzer/Statements/Expression/Call/StaticCallAnalyzer.php(155): Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\ClassLikeAnalyzer::checkFullyQualifiedClassLikeName(Object(Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\StatementsAnalyzer), 'Stripe\\FileUplo...', Object(Psalm\CodeLocation), Array, false, false, false)
#2 /home/talus/.config/composer/vendor/vimeo/psalm/src/Psalm/Internal/Analyzer/Statements/ExpressionAnalyzer.php(130): Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\Statements\Expression\Call\StaticCallAnalyzer::analyze(Object(Psalm\Internal\Analyzer\StatementsAnalyzer), Object(PhpParser\Node\Expr\StaticCall), in /home/talus/.config/composer/vendor/vimeo/psalm/src/Psalm/Internal/Provider/ClassLikeStorageProvider.php on line 47
```

Replacing the `FileUpload` by `File` makes the crash go away.

Not sure about the title of the issue, feel free to rename
